name: Slither Minus - One Hour Edition
description:
Coronabrain is striking, I feel incredibly productive, but I have no work to do. I made this in one hour for my enjoyment, maybe you will enjoy it also...

It is a one button game click the left mouse button or the X key (A Key) on your first controller.

There is no content, you cannot die, you can't lose. So what is there to lose? Play the Game.

Future plans are local multiplayer, enemies, food pellets, additional segments, and maybe more!

I will be upgrading this over the course of the next 48 hours, comment what you want to see below! Hit the post first topic tab.

  |
